mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CAMP ( CAMP_NO, BIZ_NO, CAMP_NAME, CAMP_ADDR, CAMP_DESC, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL, 3, #{campName}, #{campAddr}, #{campDesc}, #{originName}, #{changeName} )
mapper.select: SELECT CAMP_NO campNo, BIZ_NO bizNo, CAMP_NAME campName, CAMP_ADDR campAddr, CAMP_DESC campDesc, ORIGIN_NAME originName, CHANGE_NAME changeName FROM CAMP WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CAMP_NO campNo, BIZ_NO bizNo, CAMP_NAME campName, CAMP_ADDR campAddr, CAMP_DESC campDesc, ORIGIN_NAME originName, CHANGE_NAME changeName FROM CAMP WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CAMP_NO = #{campNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAMP SET CAMP_NAME = #{campName}, CAMP_ADDR = #{campAddr}, CAMP_DESC = #{campDesc}, ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName}, CHANGE_NAME = #{changeName}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CAMP_NO = #{campNo}
UPDATE CAMP SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND CAMP_NO = #{campNo}
